about_the_game:
Bugs, Beasts, & Beyond is a thrilling PvP auto-battler. Buy monsters to build a creative team comp to whoop some butt! Releases in June 2025.

- Easy to lean, hard to master
- High skill ceiling, endless strategic depth
- Designed to create exciting, memorable moments and stories
- Endless monster combinations to get creative with
- Fair probabilities -- no RNG rigging

Bugs, Beasts, and Beyond is made by a small team of indie developers. If you would like to support us, please consider adding it to your wishlist or giving it a follow 🙏
